alert.note: Alert for Luce; Northern Schoolcraft; Southern Schoolcraft (Michigan) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued March 22 at 5:29AM EDT until March 23 at 8:00PM EDT by NWS Marquette
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 11 PM THIS EVENING TO 8 PM EDT WEDNESDAY... * WHAT...Freezing rain, sleet and snow developing this evening will change to mostly wet, dense snow by Wednesday morning. The snow may be heavy at times Wednesday morning. Expect total snow accumulations of 3 to 5 inches and ice accumulations up to two tenths of an inch. Winds gusting as high as 40 mph. * WHERE...Luce, Southern Schoolcraft and Northern Schoolcraft Counties. * WHEN...From 11 PM this evening to 8 PM EDT Wednesday. * IMPACTS...The ice accumulation followed by wet snow may result in sporadic power outages and some tree damage late tonight and Wednesday morning. Plan on slippery road conditions. The hazardous conditions will impact the Wednesday morning commute.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling.
